Package com.android.slackandhay

This package contains everything.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GameThread This is the class in which all game logic related objects are instantiated
MainActivity The Main Activity that is started once the app itself is run on the device.
R  
R.attr  
R.drawable  
R.layout  
R.raw  
R.string  
RenderSychronizer This class provides synchronization between the game thread and the render thread
SlackAndHay The actual slacknhay Activity that starts the game thread and the render thread
TestView  
UIDGenerator Outsourced from SlackAndHayMain to reduce dependencies, which makes unit testing a little easier.
